00017 void t_screen::registertexture(t_texture *t)
00018 {
00019     textures.insert(textures.begin(), t);
00020 }
00021 
00022 void t_screen::unregistertexture(t_texture *t)
00023 {
00024     for(std::vector<t_texture*>::iterator i= textures.begin(); i!=textures.end(); i++)
00025         if(t==*i) { textures.erase(i); break; }
00026 }
00027 
00028 void t_screen::rebuildtextures()
00029 {
00030     for(std::vector<t_texture*>::iterator i= textures.begin(); i!=textures.end(); i++)
00031         (*i)->rebuild();
00032 }

00034 void t_screen::setortho()
00035 {
00036     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00037     glLoadIdentity();
00038     glOrtho(0, width, height, 0, -1000, 1000);
00039     ortho= true;
00040 }
00041 
00042 void t_screen::setperspective(float fov, float asp)
00043 {
00044     aspmod= asp;
00045     this->fov= fov;
00046     const float farplane= 4096;
00047     
00048     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00049     glLoadIdentity();
00050     gluPerspective(getyfov(), getaspect(), 0.25, farplane);
00051     
00052     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00053     glLoadIdentity();
00054     
00055     ortho= false;
00056     printf("%dx%d, yfov= %.2f, aspect= %.2f\n", width, height, getyfov(), getaspect());
00057     planedist= calcplanedist();
00058 }
00059 
00060 void t_screen::gl_init(int w, int h)
00061 {
00062     glViewport(0,0, w,h);
00063     
00064     glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00065     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00066     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00067     
00068     width= w; height= h;
00069     
00070     rebuildtextures();
00071     if(ortho) setortho();
00072     else setperspective();
00073 }
00074 
00075 float t_screen::calcplanedist()
00076 {
00077     GLdouble model_mtx[16], proj_mtx[16];
00078     GLint viewport[]= { 0,0, width,height };
00079     GLdouble half, delta, x, y, z;
00080     glGetDoublev(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, model_mtx);
00081     glGetDoublev(GL_PROJECTION_MATRIX, proj_mtx);
00082     
00083     double mind= 0, maxd= 2<<14;
00084     
00085     int i;
00086     for(i= 0; i<1000; i++)
00087     {
00088         half= (mind+maxd)*0.5;
00089         gluProject(width/2, height/2, half, model_mtx, proj_mtx, viewport, &x, &y, &z);
00090         delta= x; //sqrt(x*x+y*y)*(x<0? -1: 1);
00091         if(fabs(delta)<0.0001) { printf("planedist=%.2f delta=%.2f\n", half, delta); return half; }
00092         else if(delta>0) maxd= half;
00093         else mind= half;
00094     }
00095     printf("no planedist found... mind=%.2f, maxd=%.2f, delta=%.2f\n", mind, maxd, delta);
00096     return planedist;
00097 }

00099 void t_screen::init(int w, int h, bool fullscreen)
00100 {
00101     if(SDL_Init(SDL_INIT_VIDEO)<0) fatal("Unable to initialize SDL");
00102     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_DOUBLEBUFFER, 1);
00103     sdl_surface= SDL_SetVideoMode(w, h, 0, SDL_OPENGL|(fullscreen? SDL_FULLSCREEN: SDL_RESIZABLE));
00104     if(!sdl_surface) fatal("couldn't set video mode");
00105     
00106     SDL_Surface *vs= SDL_GetVideoSurface();
00107     w= vs->w;
00108     h= vs->h;
00109     gl_init(w, h);
00110     this->fullscreen= fullscreen;
00111 }
00112 
00113 void t_screen::togglefullscreen()
00114 {
00115     fullscreen^= 1;
00116     if(fullscreen)
00117     {
00118         SDL_Rect **modes= SDL_ListModes(0, SDL_OPENGL|SDL_FULLSCREEN);
00119         int bestidx= 0, bestdiff= INT_MAX;
00120         int scrsize= width*height;
00121         if(modes!=(SDL_Rect**)-1 && modes!=0 && modes[0]!=0)
00122         {
00123             for(int i= 0; modes[i]; i++)
00124             {
00125                 int msize= modes[i]->w*modes[i]->h,
00126                     diff= msize-scrsize;
00127                 if(msize>=scrsize && diff<bestdiff)
00128                     bestidx= i, bestdiff= diff;
00129             }
00130             printf("Selected fullscreen mode %dx%d\n", modes[bestidx]->w, modes[bestidx]->h);
00131             init(modes[bestidx]->w, modes[bestidx]->h, fullscreen);
00132         }
00133     }
00134     else init(width, height, fullscreen);
00135 }
